(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (NNP Report))
      (CC and)
      (NP
        (NP (NNS photos))
        (PP (IN by)
          (NP (NNP Joao) (NNP I)))))
    (VP (MD 'll)
      (VP (VB make)
        (NP
          (NP (DT no) (NN secret))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP (DT the) (NN fact))))
        (SBAR (IN that)
          (S
            (NP
              (NP (PRP$ my) (JJ first) (NN visit))
              (PP (TO to)
                (NP (NNP Sole) (NNP Pomodoro))))
            (VP (VBD changed)
              (NP
                (NP (DT the) (NN way))
                (SBAR
                  (S
                    (NP (PRP I))
                    (VP (VBD perceived)
                      (NP (NN pizza) (NNS crusts)))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(make-8, Report-1)
cc(Report-1, and-2)
conj(Report-1, photos-3)
prep(photos-3, by-4)
nn(I-6, Joao-5)
pobj(by-4, I-6)
aux(make-8, 'll-7)
root(ROOT-0, make-8)
det(secret-10, no-9)
dobj(make-8, secret-10)
prep(secret-10, of-11)
det(fact-13, the-12)
pobj(of-11, fact-13)
mark(changed-21, that-14)
poss(visit-17, my-15)
amod(visit-17, first-16)
nsubj(changed-21, visit-17)
prep(visit-17, to-18)
nn(Pomodoro-20, Sole-19)
pobj(to-18, Pomodoro-20)
ccomp(make-8, changed-21)
det(way-23, the-22)
dobj(changed-21, way-23)
nsubj(perceived-25, I-24)
rcmod(way-23, perceived-25)
nn(crusts-27, pizza-26)
dobj(perceived-25, crusts-27)

  (S
    (NP (NNP and))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP (DT the) (JJ misguided) (NN opinion)))
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (NN crust))
          (VP (VBD was)
            (ADVP (RB merely))
            (NP
              (NP (DT a) (NN delivery) (NN vehicle))
              (PP (IN for)
                (S
                  (VP (VBG topping) (: --)
                    (S
                      (NP
                        (NP (DT a) (NN waste))
                        (PP (IN of)
                          (NP (NNS carbs))))
                      (VP (TO to)
                        (VP (VB be)
                          (VP (VBN avoided)
                            (SBAR (IN if)
                              (FRAG
                                (ADJP (JJ possible))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))

                (NNP Gerri)))

              (PP (IN from)
                (NP (NNP Sardinia)))

                  (NP (DT neither))

    (S

        (PP (IN of)

        (ADJP

          (PP (TO to)
            (S

        (, ,)))))
